chapter.title: Logging In to Knowledge
chapter.para: You will receive an email when the administrator creates an account for you. The email will contain login information (be sure to check your spam folder) which will enable the you to access the Knowledge web-application. If you do not receive an email, contact your Knowledge administrator. After your first login your password should be changed.

section.title: User Roles
section.para:
Knowledge has 6 roles Author, Administrator, and Read. Each of these roles have different permissions:
Read role: Allows users to view content and download content releases.
Editor role: Editors modify content, create new content, search, classify, and download content releases
Content Manager: The Content Manager has all the capabilities of the Editor role and can release content.
System Manager: The System Manager has administrative priveleges of the whole environment
Administrator role: Can create user accounts, modify user accounts, and has all the editing functions as the Author role with the additional ability to release content.
Automated: This is a role used for system to system communicaiton.

section.title: Login
section.para:
To Login you will enter your username and password. If you've forgotten your user name or password select the appropriate link in the Knowledge Login screen. Login
Login Page

After you succcessfully login to Knowledge you will see the Manager homepage.
Homepage of user with Author role
Manager page of a user with Author role

From this page you can:
select the Profile menu option to change your user profile.
add a user or modify a user's role if you are an administrator.
select the Go To Editor button to be directed to the Knowledge Editor.
select the Go To API button to be view the Rest API documentation
select the Logout button to logout of the application

section.title: Edit User Profile
section.para:
When you select the Profile menu option you are able to modify: the Display Name, your User Name, your email address and change your password. To save any changes made you will need to select the Savebutton. The Cancelbutton will discard any changes made.
